name: bifald

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wfal))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(w1, wfal))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wfal))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(w1, wfal))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w1), wb(w1, wfal))
-| wi(w1, w1)
-| wi(wfal, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wfal))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(w1, w1)
-| wi(wfal, w1)

|- wi(w0, wb(w1, wfal))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(wfal, w1)

comment: Infer the equivalence to a contradiction from a negation, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 15-Sep-2017.)
